text: Coronaviruses are group viruses belong to Coronaviridae family can produce diseases in 24 human and animal. There are four genera under this family; Alphacoronavirus, 25 Betacoronavirus, Gammacoronavirus, and Deltacoronavirus. However, most of the human 26 coronaviruses produce mild illness in the upper respiratory tract while some strains are lethal 27 and can cause severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS), middle East respiratory syndrome

SARS-CoV-2 outbreaks occurred at the end of December, 2019; has been thought to be 54 originated from the bats as shown by evolutionarily similar genome sequence 18 . It is now a 55 serious pandemic threat and international public health concern according to World Health 56 Organization (WHO). Till May 20, 2020, around 213 countries and territories have been 57 affected by SARS-CoV-2 and ~5 million people infected with more than 334 thousand 58 deaths. The SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV supposed to be originated from bat through an 59 intermediate animal host [19] [20] [21] . MERS-CoV-2 has been reported having zoonotic transmission patients. In this review, we summarized the SARS-CoV-2 infected animal cases and recent 69 researches conducted in this field. These results suggested that cats might be naturally infected with SARS-CoV-2 that caused 177 COVID-19 in humans.
These reports suggest that SARS-CoV-2 could be transmitted humans to animals (Figure 1 ).

A microbiologist of Pennsylvania School of Veterinary Medicine also explained a concern 180 whether pets can act as reservoir of SARS-CoV-2 need to be investigated when she talked to 181 the science magazine 39 . Based on an experimental infection study the authors also suggested 182 to survey for SARS-CoV-2 in cats for minimizing the COVID-19 in humans 28 .
